events.name: Repair Kopitiam - 26th March 2017
events.description:
JOIN US in the movement to combat the buy and throw away culture through repairing together! Let us teach you step by step on how you can REPAIR YOUR OWN ITEMS in this family friendly event.

Things to bring:
An open mind to learn and try repairing.
A broken electrical appliance. [limit to 2 items per participant]
[eg. fan, blender, toaster, rice cooker, oven air pressure cooker]

VENUE:
425 Jurong West Avenue 1
&
897A Tampines Street 81

TIME:
10am - 3pm (Registration closes at 2pm)
events.location: Block 425 Jurong West Ave 1 & Block 897A Tampines Street 81, , Singapore
